<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataTR extends data { const CODE = 'TR'; const PREFIX = 90; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[2-58]\d\d|900)\d{7}|4\d{6}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2(?:[13][26]|[28][2468]|[45][268]|[67][246])|3(?:[13][28]|[24-6][2468]|[78][02468]|92)|4(?:[16][246]|[23578][2468]|4[26]))\d{7}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '56161\d{5}|5(?:0[15-7]|1[06]|24|[34]\d|5[1-59]|9[46])\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '(?:8[89]8|900)\d{7}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '592(?:21[12]|461)\d{4}'=>array( 'personal_number', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d)(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
